title: TRP and Classified Team up to Bring the VISTAR // Powershift Drop Bar Groupset to Market
content:
The TRP VISTAR // Powershift brings Classified's two-speed hub gearing to a fully-integrated groupset, allowing a 1x16 shifting system.

Read the full article at TRP and Classified Team up to Bring the VISTAR // Powershift Drop Bar Groupset to Market on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
